message.entry: Unable to create a service server with service name {0} and type {1}.
An error occurred while shutting down the service server. It may still be on the network.
Error occurred while requesting information on the ROS 2 service server.
ROS 2 node is no longer accessible by the service server. Recreate the service server on a valid node.
Invalid network reference stored by the ROS 2 service server. Recreate the service server.
Multiple ROS 2 service servers with the same reference on node. Recreate the node.

An error occurred evaluating the service server callback function The server will reply with the default response message. Ensure that the NewRequestFcn property of the service server is set to a valid callback that will not error. Error details: {0}
An error occurred sending the service response from the server. The server will try to reply with the default response message. Ensure response message structure is correct. Error details: {0}
Service {0} with type {1} is already on the ROS 2 network. Try creating the service server with type {1}, not {2}.
